price: 17. Tad ar jie nežiūri į kupranugarius – kaip jie buvo sukurti?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
